Class ApartmentCommands

java.lang.Object
pl.mgarbowski.hotelapp.commands.ApartmentCommands
@Command(command="apartment", group="apartment") public class ApartmentCommands extends Object
Shell commands for managing apartments.

  • Method Details

    • searchFreeApartmentsInCity

      @Command(command="searchCity", description="Search free apartments in city") public String searchFreeApartmentsInCity(String city, Date start, Date end)
      Searches for free apartments in a specified city within a date range.
      Parameters:
      city - the city to search in
      start - the start date of the booking
      end - the end date of the booking
      Returns:
      a string representation of available apartments or a message if none are available
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if any parameter is null

      Returns:
